description: Plasa Colombia is an innovative initiative aimed at understanding and improving food systems in Colombia. By mapping food production, consumption, and environmental impacts, it creates a comprehensive online platform that houses vital data. This collaborative effort involves universities and organizations, fostering a community of practice focused on food-related issues. Plasa Colombia serves as a resource for informed decision-making, promoting awareness and advocacy for sustainable food practices and policies across the nation.
name: Plasa Colombia
